historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 16-4308.

1973 Ed., T. 16, Appx., § 9.

Miscellaneous Notes

Repeal of Uniform Arbitration Act: D.C. Law 17-111, § 3, Feb. 27, 2008, 55 DCR 1847, provides: "Effective July 1, 2009, Chapter 43 of Title 16 of the District of Columbia Official Code is repealed."

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 8 of the Uniform Arbitration Act. See Volume 7, Part I Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 16-4308

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)
